attributes.action: MPs salaries to be frozen at current level for the remainder of this parliament.
attributes.additional_details: The debate is to allow MPs to identify how much can be saved and demonstrate to the British People that we are all in it together when we the country needs it's population to tighten our belts.
attributes.background: Parliament to debate MPs salaries to be frozen at current levels for the remainder of this parliament in order to reduce costs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 
 
You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
